fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the abilities of the roles you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be given two random Coven roles. Those are your roles, but you win with the Unseen.
- You will not gain permanent defense, even if your role grants that.
- You will not get access to the factional chat. You may also never receive the Necronomicon.
- You may only get one Coven (Head) role.
- If you get a role that can only target/affect members of the Coven, they will instead relate to the Unseen.
- You may multitask.
